TextLibrary.Text: You do not need to battle the Fire Elemental as Drong is not here to try any of the rocks. You should return with Drong.
You have failed to defeat the Fire Elemental. You'll need to beat it before Drong can have any tasty volcanic rocks.
Drong rewards you for finding him some tasty volcanic rocks.
You must journey to the Volcano to find volcanic rocks for Drong.
